channel.title: Robustness on Serhat Giydiren
channel.description: Recent content in Robustness on Serhat Giydiren

item.title: AI Safety Diary: September 19, 2025
item.description: A diary entry on Chapter 7 of the AI Safety Atlas, focusing on the challenge of generalization and ensuring AI systems behave reliably when encountering novel, out-of-distribution scenarios.

item.title: AI Safety Diary: September 3, 2025
item.description: A diary entry on Chapter 5 of the AI Safety Atlas, focusing on evaluation methods for assessing the safety and alignment of advanced AI systems, including benchmarks and robustness testing.
